title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about winning a competition according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about winning a competition indicates many different meanings and connotations that differ from one vision to another, due to the events that occur during it, as well as the situation in which the viewer finds himself, and the various problems or crises that he may suffer from in our lives. We will explain the clearest interpretations that were made clear in the vision of winning a competition. Interpretation of a dream about winning a competition: Seeing yourself winning a large competition in a dream means that the dreamer will achieve the ambitions he seeks during this period. Seeing yourself winning a competition against a great enemy in a dream indicates an improvement in the psychological state. For the dreamer and relief from all the problems he suffers from. If someone dreams in a dream that he wins a competition and feels happy, this indicates the end of all fears and a feeling of satisfaction. Winning the competition and not putting in much effort indicates the anxiety that the viewer feels at the moment. Who sees In his dream, he won a competition and cried, then this is evidence that he will achieve a big dream that he seeks. Seeing yourself participating in a big competition and not winning it indicates the efforts that the dreamer is making to achieve his dream. If you see yourself winning a competition competition in a dream, this means that the fortuneteller He will get a promotion in his field of work soon. Interpretation of a dream about winning a competition by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that seeing victory in some competitions indicates an improvement in the fortuneteller’s financial situation and the elimination of all his worries. Seeing yourself winning a big competition according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation suggests that the dreamer will overcome all obstacles that It stands in the way of achieving his dream. If a person sees in a dream that he is winning a competition in certain questions, this is evidence that he will live a carefree life. To see yourself winning a competition and feel sad means that the dreamer will fall into a major problem in the field of work. Ibn Sirin explained Seeing winning a famous competition indicates an improvement in one’s psychological state and the final elimination of all difficulties and obstacles. Winning a competition in a dream is a sign of the joy that the dreamer will have in his life. Interpretation of a dream about winning an individual competition: Unmarried women see in a dream that they are entering a big competition and winning, This means that they will live a calm and carefree life. If an unmarried woman sees that she is entering a competition and cannot win, this is evidence of the efforts she is making to achieve all her goals. Seeing unmarried women winning a competition and feeling upset indicates that there are many thoughts that are tiring them out. And you don't know how to overcome it. Winning an individual competition shows that he is far from all the problems he is going through and that he will soon achieve a big dream. Winning a competition and feeling happy for individuals means that they will get a new job and earn more money. Interpretation of a dream about winning an individual awardIf you see that you have won With a big prize in a certain field, it means that single people will succeed and achieve more goals. To see yourself winning a big prize in a dream for an unmarried woman means that you will hear some happy news that awaits you soon. If she sees someone else...

title: Interpretation of a dream about consolation in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Condolences in a dream Interpretation of a dream Condolences in a dream Gatherings of loved ones are among the most joyful and warm moments, but not all gatherings are happy and full of joy. There may be times when there is a lot of sadness and oppression, such as the funeral homes that are organized for the dear and beloved dead and according to the amount of reward that reaches the deceased from this condolence, but it is one of the homes that everyone fears and has dread in their hearts. Condolences are always associated with tears, pain and sadness, and they have a stirring effect on everyone's hearts, but what about seeing condolences in a dream? Is it a good sign? Or is it about evil and sadness as it really is? We will learn this through the different website about the interpretation of a dream about consolation in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about consolation in a dream: A person may wake up from his sleep after seeing comfort in a dream with a broken heart and a disturbed mood because he believes that this dream has an ominous meaning and fear and anxiety begin to control him, but all dreams that We see it linked to him. Its interpretation of the dreamer’s condition, which is not necessarily bad for everyone, and we will talk about it below. Interpretation of a dream about condolences in a dream: Condolences in a dream suggests that the dreamer will be patient with the misfortunes and worries that befall him in his life. This dream indicates that the dreamer has good morals. Seeing condolences in a dream, but without tears. It is a sign of good and great luck. Interpretation of a dream about consolation in a dream. It is a warning to the dreamer to stay away from error and return to God. Holding a funeral in a dream for a deceased person in reality is evidence that his place is Paradise, God willing. If the dreamer sees that consolation in the dream is for his father, then the dream indicates that he is a good and fair son to his parents. If the dreamer is poor, then the consolation in his dream indicates that there is someone who supports him to overcome his crises. But if the dreamer is rich, then the consolation in his dream shows his high status among people. If comfort in the dream was a place for the dreamer, then this indicates the hardness of his heart and his sins. Interpretation of the dream of consolation in The dream could be a sign of bad and sad news. The dream could be a harbinger for the dreamer that there is harm to him. The dreamer’s presence to rest in his dream indicates his good character and support for others. If he sees himself consoling the dead in the dream, this indicates his adherence to Sharia law. If the consolation turns into joy in the dream, this indicates The corruption of people and their disregard for rights and their love for the world. Interpretation of a dream about mourning in a dream. Without the presence of the dead, this is an indication of the tragedies that the dreamer will go through. Eating at a funeral in a dream indicates anxiety, sadness, and anguish. If the mourning is in the dreamer’s house, this indicates comfort and good news. Crying with the mourner in mourning indicates worries. And misfortunes. If he sees that rest is a place for someone he knows, then the dream indicates that this person is characterized by wisdom and good morals. But if the funeral in the dream is a place for a living person, then it indicates travel or marriage. Wearing black clothes in a dream means good news. Read also: Dream interpretation of the white mouse symbol In a dream: Interpretation of a dream about condolences in a dream for a single woman: Condolences indicate a solution

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a traffic accident and surviving it according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Commentators mentioned it: Interpretation of a dream about a car accident and escaping from it. It is not a unified interpretation for men and women, but it differs depending on the family situation and also differs according to the type of car, so today we will discuss the consequences of seeing a car accident in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident and escaping from it by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of a dream about a car accident and escaping from it? Seeing a car accident in a dream and saving it means that the dreamer is afraid and worried about many things in his life. The dream also shows that the dreamer is going through bad psychological conditions that lead him to wish for death and leave this life with all its problems. One of the most important indicators is that the dreamer has many competitors in his life and always believes that he He does not have the capabilities that would push him to defeat his enemies, so it is important for him to trust himself and his abilities. Surviving a car accident in a dream is evidence of existing problems between the dreamer and one of his relatives, and he is forced to overcome them in order to preserve friendship and kinship. This dream about a young suitor is an indication that he is creating problems between him and His fiancée and things may reach the point of separation. The car accident and his survival after falling into the water is a sign that the dreamer is taking a wrong path that will bring him problems and that he will lose important people in his life due to walking on this road. A car accident on a bumpy road is an indication that the dreamer He will face a problem at work and will not be able to solve it. From the point of view of interpreters, this dream warns the dreamer that he will make wrong decisions in his life, so he must study the decision well and know its consequences before making it. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident and surviving it by Ibn SirinAnyone who sees Himself in a car accident but he managed to survive, it shows that he is going through a difficult problem that makes him unable to continue his life, but in the end he will be able to find a solution. The dream also explains that the dreamer is currently going through a financial crisis, but he will be able to pay off all his debts because the Lord of the Worlds will open It has the doors to livelihood and relief. Dreaming about a car accident and surviving it indicates that the dreamer is very afraid of many things in his life, so he is unable to make the right decisions about them, so he needs the advice of a sensible and wise person. A small car accident is a sign that the dreamer He has the ability to overcome the difficulties he faces in achieving his goals. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident and surviving it for a single woman. An unmarried girl who dreams of a car accident and runs away from it is a sign of her confusion and confusion regarding a number of issues in her life. If the girl is related, the dream indicates However, her relationship with her lover will not be stable in the coming period, and if she loves him, it is better to be patient so as not to lose him. A car accident in a single woman’s dream indicates that she is making wrong decisions that will make her life take bad paths that will end with her death. Whoever sees himself in a car accident and someone helps her This indicates that she will officially connect with a good person who will appreciate her presence in his life. The girl who is studying and has this dream, this tells her that she will not do well in the upcoming exams and

title: The most prominent 50 interpretations of milk in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about milk in a dream It has several interpretations that usually lead to goodness and blessings if it is fresh, but if it is curdled, you have to make some effort, and one of its disadvantages is if you see that the milk is cloudy or its color changes. We learn all these interpretations in detail through our topic today. Interpretation of a dream about milk in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream about milk? According to most commentators, milk represents money and promises that will make the mother's life better in the future if she sees milk that is white in color and tastes good. We learn everything that the scholars of interpretation have brought about seeing milk in a dream: If the milk spoils and its color and taste change, there are many problems occurring in his life that make him feel tense in the forest, and some scholars have suggested that it is a sign of the corruption of the dreamer's religion and the whims of his followers. Desires, and thus he does not find pleasure or happiness in his life. If there is a small amount of milk in the container, he suffers from a lack of money and must make a greater effort to obtain it through lawful means. The girl who sees her vision shows that she is a good and honest girl and does not hold grudges or hatred towards friends or other acquaintances, but rather cares about developing her own skills without looking at others. Seeing a man full of milk indicates that he will earn a lot of money in the coming period and that he is a righteous person who searches for the legitimacy of his restaurant and drinks it and is not satisfied with an alternative. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin's dream of milk? It expresses an improvement in the person's condition, if he was sick in the previous period or suffering from an illness or debt, then the exemption will be soon (God willing) and he will be freed from his illness and be able to pay. From his debts. As for the one who sees that he drinks it and enjoys its taste, he will soon reap the fruits of his good deeds, and enjoy his life with those he loves. It is the lawful food that God provides for him, because he wants to feed his family from the lawful, even if it is little, away from the forbidden, even if it is a lot. If a woman brings it and puts it in front of her children, may God bless them, and make them grow a good plant. What is the interpretation of Imam al-Sadiq’s dream of milk? Imam al-Sadiq said that whoever sees milk and drinks a lot of it is about to enter into a battle or competition in the work or trade that he manages, but victory and victory are his in the end. A sign of many happy events that happen to the visionary. If he is going through a serious financial crisis, it will end soon and his living conditions will improve. If the milk is contaminated or disturbed, there are many differences that he goes through and it requires a kind of intelligence and wisdom in dealing with them to overcome them. Go to Google and type the Egyptian dream interpretation site and you will find all the interpretations of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of milk for a single woman The girl who sees milk in her dream and its color is pure white is characterized by With chastity and chastity in reality and does not know how to play with words or escape and cheat, and seeing milk in a dream for singles indicates that he is on the right path and must not deviate from it. If her life passes without finding the right man who protects her from the woes of time and she was satisfied with the will of God without despair, then her vision is good news for her soon she will

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pregnancy in a dream - the symbol of pregnancy in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing pregnancy in a dream - a symbol of pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that indicate pregnancy. In the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. Today we will talk about the interpretation of dreams that indicate pregnancy, and everyone here is wondering whether this dream is good or bad today. You can see: Interpretation of a dream about seeing hair combed in a dream. A dream - a symbol of combing hair in a dream. Seeing an unknown woman as if she is pregnant, and this indicates distress, worry, and bad news, while the woman is known. Or a married woman in a dream, this indicates a very good feeling and comfort after anxiety and the disappearance of worries. Seeing my friend pregnant in a dream. If the woman sees Her friend is pregnant and unmarried, this is an indication of expanding sustenance, and the larger the belly, the more sustenance and money. And if the friend is married, this indicates an abundance of sustenance, good offspring, and finding solutions to her problems. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy without marriage: If a barren, married woman sees that she is pregnant, this indicates bad news. And sadness and delusion, but if she is married. This indicates comfort, the removal of worries soon, and a lot of goodness, and if she is not married yet, then this is the case. It indicates comfort in her affairs after hardships and suffering, and comfort after fatigue, and it also indicates a bright and promising future. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy by Ibn Sirin: Pregnancy for a man in a dream indicates increased enjoyment of this world, wealth, wealth, and progress in work, and it can indicate sadness, grief, and bad news. If a man sees that he has given birth to a girl, this indicates the openness of the world, abundance of livelihood, and abundance of good deeds. And if the newborn is a boy, this indicates the openness of the world, abundance of livelihood, and abundance of good deeds. A sign of anxiety, suffering, problems, and diseases. Seeing a pregnancy for a woman: This indicates a lot of money, kindness, and a pregnant woman. If she sees that she gave birth to a female, the baby will be male, and if she sees that she gave birth to a male, the baby will be female, and perhaps the opposite happens, and this is according to the nature of the fortuneteller. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy For another person, if someone sees someone in his pregnant friend’s pajamas, or the interpretation of seeing a woman pregnant with a girl, or losing a pregnant colleague. It shows that person’s suffering and his need for help and advice or debts, and he needs someone to pay off his debt on his behalf. Or he is in a psychological crisis and needs help and someone to raise his psychological morale and strengthen Support him. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a virgin girl. If a virgin sees that she is pregnant, this indicates that she has gone through difficult stages in her life, and if she is a student, this can indicate success and excellence. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a single woman by her lover. If an unmarried girl sees that she is pregnant with a girl, this indicates comfort. After hardships, success and prosperity. If she sees that she is pregnant with a son, this can indicate problems, diseases and problems in her life that will end quickly, God willing. And if she sees that she is pregnant by her lover, she will achieve what she wants in life and achieve what she normally requires and prosperity. A dream about pregnancy is for a married woman who has children, if A married woman with children sees that she is pregnant when in fact she is not, then this is what happens. It indicates an expansion of the scope of living, an improvement in financial conditions, and an end to marital disputes. Interpretation of a dream about

Interpretation of a dream of pregnancy for a single woman by her lover If an unmarried girl sees that she is pregnant with a girl, this indicates comfort after hardships, success and prosperity. If she sees that she is pregnant with a boy, this can indicate problems, diseases and problems in her life and will end quickly, God willing. If she sees that she is pregnant from her lover, she will achieve what she wants in life and achieve what she asks for from habit and prosperity. A dream of pregnancy for a married woman with children If a married woman who has children sees that she is pregnant and she is not in reality, this is what happens It indicates an expansion of the scope of living, an improvement in financial conditions, and the end of marital disputes. Interpretation of a dream of

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sermon in the pulpit in a dream - seeing the imam of the mosque in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sermon in the pulpit in a dream - seeing the imam of the mosque in a dream. Interpretation of seeing preaching on the pulpit in a dream by Ibn Sirin al-Nabulsi ibn Shaheen. Seeing preaching in the pulpit in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned that the pulpit in a dream indicates the sultan or the ruler. Whoever sees that he ascended On the pulpit and preach on Friday, or speak kind words, or preach to the people or worshipers inside the mosque. If he is qualified for sermon and guardianship, he will obtain a high-ranking position and authority. And if he does not deserve the pulpit and sermon, then he is known for his justice. Whoever sees that he is on the pulpit does not speak a word, or He sees that he is uttering obscene words or obscene words in the pulpit, and if he is not qualified to deliver a sermon, he may pray on the trunk, and if the ruler or president sees that he is on a wooden or wooden pulpit and the pulpit breaks in it, then he will either see that he fell to the ground and fell to the ground, or that one of them He took him down from the pulpit, then he died or withdrew from the crisis. Seeing the Imam in a man’s dream: The appearance of the Imam in the dream of a married or unmarried man is interpreted as seeing the president or king in a dream. The Imam is also a model of an alert man with a lively moral sense, and it is also an indication of The dreamer’s truth, justice, and virtue. Seeing the steadfastness of the Imam and his entourage is evidence of strength, goodness, and advancement in knowledge, influence, and authority. It is an indication of the fortuneteller’s kindness and decency, and the monarch should take the words of the Imam in the dream as a message. It is guidance that must be carried out. It is a real vision and a warning to the monarch, and it may This vision represents the fairness of his affairs in this world and the hereafter. As for the one who sees himself as an imam in a dream, leading the people and giving them a sermon, this foretells a distinguished position that the Lord will attain. As for the priest’s sermon to the people on Friday, it indicates satisfying the people’s needs or leading them and assuming the affairs and responsibility of the people and the people in his life, by God. I know. Seeing the imam of the mosque in one dream. As for seeing the imam in the dream of an unmarried girl or an unmarried woman, this indicates the purity of that girl, her chastity, chastity, and the soundness of her morals. Seeing the imam in a dignified image dominated by dignity, piety, and piety indicates the necessity of single people adhering to values, morals, and customs. Seeing the imam It is good as long as he is smiling and cheerful, and the opposite is true if the imam appears in a dream unmarried, frowning and frowning. Seeing an unmarried imam preaching to people on Friday is considered good news of a marriage and happy tidings. As for an unmarried girl who sees the imam in a dream as if she is proposing to her, this is good news. For a good husband and a happy, peaceful family life, if the girl sees in a dream that she has agreed to marry him, and the best dream is the vision. The imam wears a turban, which indicates soundness of mind, mind, and thought. Also, seeing a tall imam is better than a short imam, and a fat imam is better than a skinny imam. The best dream is for a single girl to see the Imam giving her a Qur’an, clothes, or perfume, and the best gift for clothes is white and green. Seeing a single Imam with a thick and long beard symbolizes the depth of the girl’s knowledge and wisdom. Seeing a single person with a light shining from the Imam’s forehead is a sign of goodness, joy, and happiness.

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking on broken glass in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about walking on broken glass in a dream We can search for an interpretation of a dream about walking on broken glass in a dream from dreams that many wanted to know the interpretation of this dream. In interpretations, but by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream of walking on broken glass in a dream: A dream of walking on a glass may indicate that the dreamer suffered from a major problem during this period. In the event that someone saw that he was walking on glass, This may indicate the bad reality that the dreamer is suffering from at that time. A dream of walking on broken glass may indicate that you discover a mistake made by someone during this time. A person’s dream of walking on broken glass may indicate that some people deceived him and manipulated him in that time. Days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking on agricultural land in a dream. Anyone who dreams that he is walking on agricultural land, could be a sign of blessing and goodness that will come his way during that time. Walking on agricultural land in a dream could be a sign of the dreamer’s good behavior and morals. Whoever dreams that they walked on agricultural land, may indicate the abundance of sustenance and money that will come to them in the coming period, thanks to God. In the event that someone sees that they walked on agricultural land, this may be an indication of positive changes that are occurring in your life during this time. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking on Zamzam water in a dream: If a person sees that he is walking on Zamzam water, this may indicate the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations in the coming period, thanks to God. Walking on Zamzam water in a dream may be a sign of recovery from diseases that the owner suffered from. The vision in the previous period. If a person sees that he is walking on Zamzam water, this may be a sign of the end of the worry and sorrow that the person having the vision faced in his life at that time, thanks to God. If a person sees that he is walking on Zamzam water, this indicates the abundance of livelihood and broad satisfaction that The dreamer acquires it at this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of walking on my knees in a dream If a person sees that he is walking on his knees, this may indicate the distress that the dreamer is going through in those days. Walking on the knee in a dream may be a sign of a crisis that the dreamer is going through during This time. If one sees that he was walking on his knees, it may be a sign of the material loss that the dreamer may experience during those days. When one sees that he was walking on his knees, it may be a sign that he was very deceived and deceived during this time. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking in a cemetery in a dream: Anyone who dreams of walking in a cemetery can be a sign of the bad psychological state that a friend is exposed to during that period. Walking in a cemetery in a dream can be a sign of unhappy things that happen to the dreamer in those days. In the event that someone saw that he was walking in the cemetery, this may be a sign of a material loss that the dreamer may suffer in those days. If someone sees in his dream that he is walking among the graves, this may be a sign.

title: Interpretation of a dream about lice in hair

preview.html: In this article, we will explain from our translator site all the interpretations of this vision and in the case of each person, and the opinion of the translators on it. Follow us.Interpretation of seeing lice in the hair in a dream for a single girl. An unmarried girl who sees lice in her dream indicates that she has a disease that she has recovered from, and God knows best. Seeing a single girl with lice in a dream also indicates the presence of enemies and haters who hate her. The feeling of an unmarried girl who has many Of lice crawling on her head, means her ability to fulfill her desires. Lice in an unmarried girl’s dream has many enemies who want to harm her. Seeing a sleeping single girl trying to get rid of the lice on her head. It is a praiseworthy vision, because it indicates liberation from sorrows. A large lice indicates In the dream of an unmarried girl, it indicates that she has weak enemies that she must pay attention to. An unmarried girl who sees brown lice in her dream indicates that she will obtain a high position. Public lice in a dream are bad enemies. If the girl is sick, the lice indicate the length of her illness. And God knows best. Flying lice in a dream for one girl indicates almost recovery from the disease. See also: Interpretation of seeing lice in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of seeing lice in the hair in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees lice in her dream, this means getting rid of worry and anxiety. It appears The vision also means the arrival of many good things to this woman. Seeing a married woman with lice spread on her clothes means that she will be freed from troubles and sorrows. Killing a married woman because of lice in her dream is comfort and a way out of distress. Also, seeing killing lice in a dream refers to people Those who want to harm them. Lice in a married woman’s dream indicates torment and evil in words. If she is a sick married woman and sees lice falling from her in her dream. The vision indicates that she will soon recover from the illness. A married woman who sees lice in her new clothes means a promotion in the job. Lice in A married woman’s dream is enemies and haters. A lot of lice in a married woman’s dream indicates problems between her husband. A lice walking in a married woman’s house in a dream is a sign of many sins and injustice. Interpretation of seeing lice in the hair in a dream about a man and its meaning. Seeing lice in a married man’s dream means comfort and abundance. In sustenance. Seeing a man in a dream killing lice indicates the death of anguish and sadness. Killing lice in a married man’s dream indicates overcoming adversity and difficulties. Lice found on a man’s clothes in a dream indicates deception, hypocrisy, and false feelings. If a person works as a merchant, then Lice in his sleep is a material loss. The appearance of lice in a man’s dream from his body portends the death of someone close to him. It indicates worry, worry, and severe anxiety. The man killed the lice on his head, which showed that he recovered from a disease he was suffering from. The man who sees lice on his head in a dream And does not kill him, the vision indicates that he is going through a financial crisis. Seeing a man in a dream eating a lot of lice on his head and feeling pain. Evidence

title: Buying fish in a dream for a pregnant woman

preview.html: And its interpretation for every man in general, and all you have to do, dear visitor, is read the rest of the article to understand what we mean. Interpretation of the vision of buying fish in a dream for a single girl. There are many interpretations in the field of fish, but the vision of buying fish in the dream of an unmarried girl. It is a sign of goodness. What we seek in her life, God willing. Seeing a single girl buying fish with someone she does not know in a dream. This is likely to be a marriage or engagement in the near future, God willing. Seeing fish eating after catching them in an unmarried girl’s dream is nothing but a lot of money coming to her. This is if the fish is fresh. In light of adopting the statements of some dream interpreters that seeing a fish market is in the maneuvers of an unmarried girl. It is a sign that major changes will occur in her life with the help of God Almighty. Ibn Sirin says that the vision of buying fresh fish is in the interpretation of an unmarried girl. It can be To be superior or successful, which means that it is a promising vision in both cases. As for Ibn Shaheen’s vision of buying fresh fish, it may not differ much from Ibn Sirin’s vision. See also: Seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a fish market in a dream for a married womanWhen a woman sees For a married woman in a dream that she is buying fish, the evidence for the interpretation is the goodness that awaits her in reality. And the interpretation of seeing buying raw fish in a minaret for a married woman. It indicates problems or pressures in your life. While you see a lot of fish in a pregnant woman’s dream. So, his interpretation of it is A lot of money, or finding a new job. Some great dream interpreters said that seeing a dead fish in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign of an unpredictable interpretation, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Ibn Shaheen said that he saw a small fish in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign On limited means of livelihood, if the fish is fresh and healthy. While Abu Shirin said that he saw a small fish in a married woman’s dream. A sign of waiting for something related to the vision. Interpretation of a dream about buying fish for a man and its meaning. A married man saw that he was buying a fish and taking it to his family in a dream. It is likely That this is a widespread diet for his household. While seeing a restless fish in a dream, it means limited money or a new limited business for the dreamer. But seeing a fish market moving in a dream. It is a sign of abundance of money, and perhaps even inheritance, that is, it is money without effort. Ibn Sirin talks about the frequent purchase of fresh fish in a married man’s dream. It is money that comes to the dreamer from where he does not know. As for Ibn Shaheen, he said in a dream that a married man buys cooked fish, then this is a good deed for the one who sees the vision. The meaning of buying fish in The dream of a married man. It is a promising vision and a consolidation of a lot of good for its owner, with the help of God Almighty. Read also: Interpretation of eating grilled fish. The meaning of seeing fish in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If a pregnant woman dreams of buying fish, this is a dream that expresses the health of the newborn. Some dream interpreters have concluded that seeing Buying fresh fish in a pregnant woman’s dream represents money and good luck that will not leave her. While the other section sees it
